LanguageData.AUP_BirthdayPickGene: Choose a {1} gene for {0_nameDef} to gain via mutation
LanguageData.AUP_FP_GeneEventChance_Tooltop: The chance for gene selections to appear on e.g. growth moments
LanguageData.AUP_FP_GoodGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give good genes.
LanguageData.AUP_FP_BadGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give bad genes.
LanguageData.AUP_FP_NeutralGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give neutral genes.
LanguageData.AUP_FP_RandomGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give random genes.
